I have one question: what is the challenge?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24898-Challenge-Submission-Guide

Please read the challenge submission guide.

id like to propose a chanange Orbit where moho orbited in the final winer for the space speedrun video so see you there EDIT:Use the least amount on ingame time EDIT 2: STockÃ¢â‚¬â€¹!! :cool:

Umm.. let's try and parse that.

Your inner ID wants mr. chanange to put asteroid 15606 Winer (2000 GU122) such that moho will orbit it, and film that for a speedrun video?

Your inner ID wants mr. chanange to put asteroid 15606 Winer (2000 GU122) such that moho will orbit it, and film that for a speedrun video?

Even parsed that doesn't make any sense. And what is with the title?

I think the challenge is to do a stock speed run to moho. Maybe with a video to prove it?

In any case I agree that you need to read the challenge submission guidelines. Where is your attempt?

Umm.. let's try and parse that.

Your inner ID wants mr. chanange to put asteroid 15606 Winer (2000 GU122) such that moho will orbit it, and film that for a speedrun video?

No, he clearly wants to propose to mr. chanange in an Orbit where moho orbited... and he wants to see a speedrun video for the final winer. Using the least amount of ingame time.

I assume it is a fastest time to moho orbit challenge, with video proof.

But, seeing as how horribly worded this is, I may be totally wrong.

there is an extra "n" in "chanange" that should be replaced with two "l"s, and Moho, the target, is the closest planet in ksp to the sun. "n" is the third letter in "sun".

the third letters in "burn" and "mark", which are both in the title, are both "r." if you remove the "r" from "winer", you get wine. wine is served with cheese and crackers. crackers are squares. squares are shapes with four sides.

there are three kerbal faces in the description.

a shape with three sides is a triangle.

Illuminati confirmed, people. Illuminati confirmed.

Each day here are tns of this crappy "challenges" which just trash the challenge sub-forum.

Probably we can make a restriction here, so that challenge thread can only be started if there is more than 1000 words in description and at least one picture or video for OP attempt?

Probably it will be enough to limit useres who can start a thread in challenges, to, say have at least 50 posts, or time since registered more than half a year?

(Actually, does anyone know where such a request should be planted on the forum?)

1000 words and a pic/vid is a bit harsh. That would require enough text to fill two pages, and I've seen some pretty good challenges with not a shred of video or even a picture.

What I think is that if a challenge has not been understood by anyone after a couple days, it needs to get locked or something.

if a challenge has not been understood by anyone after a couple days, it needs to get locked or something.

This has been open 4 days. MODS! Lock. Now. Pls... or OP, make the description better. In other words, make it in English people can understand. K? Good.
aka get close to the sun very very quick and .25 olny

I guess opening KSP, going to tracking station and zooming to the Sun counts, but what's .25 Olny? never heard of such a gun.

Seriously, please, write a good description, and give it someone to read. We can't even understand what the challenge is.
